transcript:
Rost6v looked inimically at Pierre, first be- cause Pierre appeared to his hussar eyes as a rich civilian, the husband of a beauty, and in a word an old woman; and secondly because Pierre in his preoccupation and absent-mind- edness had not recognized Rostov and had not responded to his greeting. When the Emperor's health was drunk, Pierre, lost in thought, did not rise or lift his glass. 
"What are you about?" shouted Rost6v, look- ing at him in an ecstacyof exasperation. "Don't you hear
